Phrases.BuyLevel: Denne bane koster 20 orbs. Du kan samle dem inde i spillet eller købe dem i shoppen.
Phrases.CouldNotLoadDatabaseReinstall: Kunne ikke hente data fra Databasen. Du skal geninstallere spillet fra Play Store

hints.callOver: A waving gesture for uniting people
hints.stay: If you tell a dog to sit it ***** put
hints.stick: It’s brown and can be set on fire.
hints.firepit: It looks like a pan.. but I wouldn't eat anything from it!
hints.font: It can contain several buckets of water, looks like a birdbath.
hints.pool: An endless supply of water at your disposal!
hints.key: It’s tiny, it’s shiny.. but it’s the only means to get out!
hints.door: Can be opened with a certain shiny little object.
hints.bucket: Can be used to transport fluids.
